title: Butternut squash, courgette, mushroom and chorizo pasta bake
ingredients: ['300g to 400g pasta, of your choice', '1 drizzle olive oil (optional)', '1 clove garlic, finely chopped', '1 medium butternut squash, peeled and cubed', '1 courgette, sliced', '250g cheshunt mushrooms, sliced', '1 chorizo sausage, sliced (optional)', '400ml creme fraiche', '1/2 teaspoon mixed herbs', '1 handful cherry tomatoes, halved', '1 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 teaspoon sea salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '120g grated Gruyere cheese']
